Uses of Class
com.bfo.json.JsonWriteOptions

    • Uses of JsonWriteOptions in com.bfo.json

      Methods in com.bfo.json that return JsonWriteOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JsonWriteOptions JsonWriteOptions.setAllowNaN(boolean nan)
      Whether to allow NaN and Infinite values in the output.
      JsonWriteOptions JsonWriteOptions.setDoubleFormat(String format)
      The String format to use when formatting a double.
      JsonWriteOptions JsonWriteOptions.setFilter(JsonWriteOptions.Filter filter)
      Set a Filter on the writer, which can be used to restrict which nodes are written
      JsonWriteOptions JsonWriteOptions.setFloatFormat(String format)
      The String format to use when formatting a float.
      JsonWriteOptions JsonWriteOptions.setMaxArraySize(int size)
      Set the maximum number of items to print in an array.
      JsonWriteOptions JsonWriteOptions.setMaxStringLength(int size)
      Set the maximum length of a string.
      JsonWriteOptions JsonWriteOptions.setNFC(boolean nfc)
      Set whether to normalize all Strings (including map keys) to Unicode normal form C when writing.
      JsonWriteOptions JsonWriteOptions.setPretty(boolean pretty)
      Whether to pretty-print the Json, using newlines and indentation.
      JsonWriteOptions JsonWriteOptions.setSorted(boolean sorted)
      Whether to sort the keys in each map alphabetically when writing.
      Methods in com.bfo.json with parameters of type JsonWriteOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Appendable Json.write(Appendable out, JsonWriteOptions options)
      Write the Json object to the specified output
      OutputStream Json.writeCbor(OutputStream out, JsonWriteOptions options)
      Write the Json object in the CBOR format to the specified output
